About Licorn®

Licorn® is a set of tools aimed at GNU/Linux and Un*x system administrators, to help them deal with daily tasks in the most efficient manner possible.

It is designed by long-standing GNU/Linux admins, and agile-implemented in Python with flexibility and extensibility in mind. Feel free to contact us to provide feedback.
